tutorials.title: AI 101: What Models Do
tutorials.description: A practical mental model for what an AI model is doing, where it fails, and how to use it safely.

tutorials.title: AI Literacy Capstone: Compare Models with a Mini-Benchmark
tutorials.description: Build a tiny benchmark set and compare two models on the same tasks.

tutorials.title: AI Literacy: First Steps in Chat
tutorials.description: Turn vague goals into clear prompts and measurable outputs using a simple chat workflow.

tutorials.title: AI Literacy: Pitfalls (Hallucinations & Overconfidence)
tutorials.description: Spot failure modes like confident wrong answers, missing caveats, and citation theater.

tutorials.title: AI‑Assisted Coding Workflow (Safe and Repeatable)
tutorials.description: How to use AI on real projects: diffs, constraints, and verifying changes without chaos.

tutorials.title: Agentic AI: What Agents Are (and When They’re Overkill)
tutorials.description: A grounded definition of agents, tools, loops, and the situations where simple prompts are better.

tutorials.title: Agentic Capstone: Guardrailed Agent Prototype
tutorials.description: Create an agent loop with planner/router/memory and explicit guardrails (simulated tools).

tutorials.title: Agentic Flows: Hands-on Simulated Loop
tutorials.description: Build a simulated agent loop (planner/router/memory) without paid tools.

tutorials.title: Agentic Flows: Pitfalls (Tool Failures & Loops)
tutorials.description: Failure modes: tool flakiness, infinite loops, memory poisoning, and bad routing.

tutorials.title: Agentic Flows: Planner, Router, Memory
tutorials.description: A clear model of agent loops: planning, routing, tools, and memory.

tutorials.title: Audio AI Capstone: Build a Voice Notes Workflow
tutorials.description: Produce an end-to-end workflow that converts voice notes into structured tasks.

tutorials.title: Audio AI: Hands-on Transcribe + Summarize
tutorials.description: Create a workflow that turns audio into notes with verification.

tutorials.title: Audio AI: Pitfalls (WER & Diarization)
tutorials.description: Failure modes: accented speech, overlap, diarization errors, and mis-measuring WER.

tutorials.title: Audio AI: TTS & STT Basics
tutorials.description: Understand transcription and speech synthesis pipelines, and what quality metrics mean.

tutorials.title: Audiobook Pipeline: From Script to Chapters to Files
tutorials.description: A practical process for generating and organizing audio output with consistent volume and pacing.

tutorials.title: Budget AI Hardware Paths (Realistic Home Builds)
tutorials.description: Cost-effective upgrade paths, used GPU considerations, power/thermals, and “good enough” builds.

tutorials.title: Choosing the Right Model for the Job
tutorials.description: Pick models based on task type (creative, coding, analysis, image) and your hardware budget; avoid common traps.

tutorials.title: Civitai 101: How to Read Model Pages and Choose Wisely
tutorials.description: Understand checkpoints, LoRAs, triggers, example settings, and how to avoid junk downloads.

tutorials.title: Code Review with AI: Catch Issues Before They Ship
tutorials.description: Use AI as a reviewer: readability, safety, performance, and correctness checks.

tutorials.title: Coding AI Capstone: Build a CLI Helper
tutorials.description: Build a tiny CLI that wraps an LLM call (or mock) with logging and safeguards.

tutorials.title: Coding AI: Hands-on Review Loop
tutorials.description: A practical workflow: ask for a patch, review it, test it, and iterate with guardrails.

tutorials.title: Coding AI: Pitfalls (Context & Tests)
tutorials.description: Failure modes: missing context, wrong assumptions, fragile code, and untrusted tests.

tutorials.title: Coding AI: Workflow & Guardrails
tutorials.description: Use AI coding tools safely: scope control, tests, review loops, and guardrails.

tutorials.title: Compare Two Outputs: Picking the Better Result (and Why)
tutorials.description: Learn a quick method to judge outputs for accuracy, constraint-following, and usefulness.

tutorials.title: Context Is Not Memory: Why AI “Forgets”
tutorials.description: Understand context windows vs memory and how to keep AI aligned over long tasks.

tutorials.title: Copyright & Licensing Basics for AI Assets
tutorials.description: Understand licenses, attribution, and how to share models/assets responsibly.

tutorials.title: Debugging with AI: From Error Log to Fix Plan
tutorials.description: Use AI to interpret logs, propose fixes, and validate outcomes systematically.

tutorials.title: Evaluation Capstone: Evaluate Your RAG or Agent
tutorials.description: Build a small eval harness: dataset, rubric, pass/fail thresholds, and a report.

tutorials.title: Evaluation: Hands-on Rubric + Judge
tutorials.description: Design a rubric, create a small test set, and run a repeatable judge evaluation.

tutorials.title: Evaluation: Metrics vs Judges
tutorials.description: Know when to use metrics, human review, or LLM-as-judge — and how to avoid bad evals.

tutorials.title: Evaluation: Pitfalls (Leakage & Overfitting)
tutorials.description: Avoid evaluation leakage, brittle judge prompts, and tuning to your test set.

tutorials.title: File‑Based Knowledge: Organizing Notes for AI to Use
tutorials.description: Simple folder and document patterns that help both you and AI find the right info quickly.

tutorials.title: Generate → Judge → Fix: The Simplest Agentic Loop
tutorials.description: A minimal quality loop that boosts outputs using scoring and targeted revisions.

tutorials.title: Hallucinations: Why They Happen and How to Reduce Them
tutorials.description: Practical techniques to make AI more reliable: verification prompts, citations, uncertainty, and constraints.

tutorials.title: Hardware Capstone: Quantize and Fit a Model
tutorials.description: Quantize a model to fit your hardware and record the speed/quality tradeoff.

tutorials.title: Hardware: CPU vs GPU vs NPU
tutorials.description: Understand which chip helps which AI workloads, and what specs actually matter.

tutorials.title: Hardware: Pitfalls (Bottlenecks & Thermals)
tutorials.description: Avoid common bottlenecks: PCIe, memory bandwidth, VRAM paging, and thermal throttling.

tutorials.title: Hardware: Quantization Explained

tutorials.title: Hardware: VRAM vs RAM
tutorials.description: Learn what actually runs out first, and how to reason about model size vs memory.

tutorials.title: Human‑in‑the‑Loop Loops: Automate Without Losing Control
tutorials.description: Build a safe loop where AI proposes, you approve, and the system tracks progress and errors.

tutorials.title: Image AI: Hands-on Control + Inpainting

tutorials.title: Image AI: Models & Workflows

tutorials.title: Image AI: Pitfalls (Artifacts & Prompt Leakage)

tutorials.title: Image Pipelines: Iteration, Variations, and Style Locking
tutorials.description: A repeatable workflow to refine images while keeping identity, style, and quality stable.

tutorials.title: Knowledge & RAG: Chunking + Retrieval

tutorials.description: Tune chunk size, overlap, and retrieval settings using a small test set.

tutorials.title: Knowledge & RAG: Pitfalls (Metadata & Citations)
tutorials.description: Failure modes: wrong chunks, missing metadata, citation mismatches, and retrieval blind spots.

tutorials.title: Local AI Basics: LM Studio Quickstart
tutorials.description: Use LM Studio for local inference, model downloads, and simple server mode for tools.

tutorials.description: Run a local model with Ollama and produce a small speed report you can repeat.

tutorials.description: Understand batching, context size, quantization, and why some settings dramatically slow down generation.

tutorials.title: Local AI: Offline-First Workflows
tutorials.description: Design a repeatable, offline-first workflow with pinned models, logged runs, and no hidden downloads.

tutorials.title: Local AI: Pitfalls (Speed, Memory, Thermals)

tutorials.title: Local AI: Running Models Offline (Workflow)
tutorials.description: A repeatable workflow for local inference: prompts, files, logging, and verification.

tutorials.title: NPUs & Edge AI: What’s Real vs What’s Hype

tutorials.title: Output Formatting: JSON, Checklists, and Self‑Validation
tutorials.description: Force consistent outputs using schemas, validators, and step-by-step “verify then answer” patterns.

tutorials.title: Prompt Debugging: Fix Bad Outputs Fast

tutorials.title: Prompting Capstone: Prompt Suite + Tests

tutorials.title: Prompting as a System: Roles, Constraints, and Formats

tutorials.title: Prompting: Hands-on Templates
tutorials.description: Turn a good prompt into a reusable template with variables, guardrails, and examples.

tutorials.title: Prompting: Pitfalls (Ambiguity & Overconstraint)

tutorials.title: RAG: When It Helps and When It Hurts

tutorials.title: Safe Use & Risk: Privacy, Permissions, and Common Pitfalls
tutorials.description: Practical safety: what not to upload, how to protect personal data, and sane defaults.

tutorials.title: Safety & Ethics: Hands-on Policy + Red Team
tutorials.description: Write a simple usage policy and run a small red-team exercise on your workflow.

tutorials.title: Safety & Ethics: Pitfalls (Data Leakage & Bias)
tutorials.description: Common failure modes: leaking secrets, unsafe sharing, biased outputs, and false compliance.

tutorials.description: Turn safety into a deployable workflow: rules, logging, and verification steps.

tutorials.description: Use rubrics and scoring to improve quality without building full agent systems.

tutorials.description: Create tests that actually catch bugs, including edge cases and regressions.

tutorials.description: Learn the knobs that change output quality and consistency, and when to adjust them for different tasks.

tutorials.description: A practical overview of video generation, common artifacts, and how to plan better prompts and shots.
